name: api_animation_Avatar
description: The avatar asset describes the mapping of the character in the Animator.

properties.name: humanDescription
properties.description: Returns the HumanDescription used to create this Avatar.

properties.name: isHuman
properties.description: Return true if this avatar is a valid human avatar.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Return true if this avatar is a valid mecanim avatar. It can be a generic avatar or a human avatar.
